5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Mukhawwal said:“I heard Abu Sa’d, a man from the people of Madinah, say: ‘I saw Abu Rafi’, the freed slave of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), when he saw Hasan bin ‘Ali performing prayer, with his hair braided. He undid it, or told him not to do that, and said: “The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade a man from performing prayer with his hair braided.”

chapter.ara-name: باب كَفِّ الشَّعْرِ وَالثَّوْبِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Tucking up the hair and garments during Prayer
